personality.name: Stoic
personality.description: Keeps calm under pressure, resists negative effects

personality.name: Cautious
personality.description: Plans carefully, reduced damage taken from ambushes

personality.name: Loyal
personality.description: Sticks by allies, boosts affinity and teamwork

personality.name: Reckless
personality.description: Charges headfirst into danger, high damage but risky

personality.name: Wise
personality.description: Learns quickly, boosts XP and knowledge-related stats

personality.name: Kind
personality.description: Always helps others, better healing and support

personality.name: Hot-headed
personality.description: Quick to anger, gains rage faster but loses calm

personality.name: Calm
personality.description: Balanced mindset, resists fear and mental effects

personality.name: Creative
personality.description: Finds clever solutions, bonus crafting & rare item chances

combat.name: Shieldbearer
combat.description: Expert at defense, reduces all incoming damage slightly

combat.name: Sharpshooter
combat.description: Precision attacks, increases ranged damage and crit chance

combat.name: Tank
combat.description: Absorbs hits for the team, massive HP boost

combat.name: Duelist
combat.description: Skilled in one-on-one combat, boosts single-target damage

combat.name: Elementalist
combat.description: Harness elemental forces, increased elemental damage

combat.name: Brawler
combat.description: Close combat specialist, bonus melee damage

combat.name: Sniper
combat.description: Patient and deadly, critical hits deal extra damage

combat.name: Berserker Mage
combat.description: Combines magic and rage for devastating attacks

combat.name: Dual Wielder
combat.description: Expert with two weapons, increases attack speed and damage

combat.name: Tactician
combat.description: Strategic mind, gains bonus for planning and team maneuvers

special.name: Dreamwalker
special.description: Can slip between dreams and reality, gaining unique buffs from dream events

special.name: Lucky Star
special.description: Lady Luck smiles upon you, higher chance for rare drops

special.name: Charmcaster
special.description: Masters of persuasion, better deals and higher affinity gains

special.name: Shadow Veil
special.description: Able to blend into shadows, reduces enemy detection

special.name: Celestial Bond
special.description: A divine blessing grants power based on the moon phase

special.name: Gambler's Soul
special.description: Thrives on risk, higher crit chance but also more likely to miss

special.name: Beast Whisperer
special.description: Animals trust you, better taming and beast ally boosts

special.name: Blood Pact
special.description: Sacrifices HP to unleash stronger attacks

special.name: Soul Resonance
special.description: Your soul harmonizes with allies, increasing team synergy

exploration.name: Pathfinder
exploration.description: Always finds the best routes, reducing travel time and encounters

exploration.name: Treasure Hunter
exploration.description: Increased chance of finding rare items and hidden caches

exploration.name: Cartographer
exploration.description: Maps out regions in detail, revealing hidden locations and shortcuts

exploration.name: Herbalist
exploration.description: Expert at gathering plants, herbs, and alchemical ingredients

exploration.name: Beast Tracker
exploration.description: Can follow animal tracks and anticipate their movements

exploration.name: Treacherous Eye
exploration.description: Can detect traps and hidden dangers easily

exploration.name: Mystic Aura
exploration.description: Senses magical energies in the surroundings

exploration.name: Adventurer's Instinct
exploration.description: Always aware of hidden opportunities and shortcuts

exploration.name: Night Owl
exploration.description: Excels in nighttime exploration with fewer penalties

exploration.name: Weather Adept
exploration.description: Adjusts well to harsh weather, reducing negative effects

crafting_gathering.name: Master Craftsman

crafting_gathering.name: Alchemy Expert
crafting_gathering.description: Potions and elixirs are more potent and stable

crafting_gathering.name: Blacksmith
crafting_gathering.description: Weapons and armor gain additional stats when forged

crafting_gathering.name: Forager

crafting_gathering.name: Innovator
crafting_gathering.description: Develops new tools, improving efficiency and versatility

motivated.description: Inspired and ready to achieve goals

stats.description: Instantly escape from battle or return to town
+25% chance to discover rare dream events

dream_events.description: The stars align to bestow their blessing upon you

dream_events.name: Waifu Serenade

dream_events.description: You seize a burning flame that powers your spirit

dream_events.name: Divine Embrace

business_events.description: Your Waifu Café holds a seasonal festival, attracting crowds from afar.

business_events.description: A sudden health inspection forces you to shut down for cleaning.

business_events.description: Your dojo's student wins a regional tournament, boosting popularity.

business_events.name: Dojo Brawl
business_events.description: A rivalry causes a destructive brawl inside the dojo.

business_events.description: Your Enchanted Shop acquires a relic everyone desires.

business_events.description: Thieves break in and steal a chunk of your profits.

business_events.description: The Adventure Guild signs multiple adventurers for new contracts.

business_events.description: A guild member is caught cheating, reputation suffers.

business_events.description: Your spa staff gets overworked, lowering customer satisfaction.

business_events.name: Successful Potion Experiment
business_events.description: Your Alchemy Lab develops a groundbreaking potion.

business_events.name: Lab Explosion
business_events.description: A risky experiment backfires, causing downtime.

business_events.name: Grand Tournament
business_events.description: The Arena hosts a legendary tournament, drawing massive crowds.

business_events.description: Gladiators strike against unfair wages, halting battles.

business_events.name: Crystal Mine Strike
business_events.description: The miners demand better pay, halting production.

business_events.name: Crystal Overflow
business_events.description: A sudden magical surge increases crystal output.

business_events.name: Ancient Tome Found
business_events.description: The Royal Library unearths a long-lost tome of power.

business_events.name: Library Fire
business_events.description: A fire damages rare scrolls, lowering output.

business_events.name: Waifu Showcase
business_events.description: Your theater holds a major performance, waifus shine brightly.

business_events.name: Stage Scandal
business_events.description: One of your waifus embarrasses herself on stage, lowering fan trust.

business_events.name: Dimensional Invaders
business_events.description: Something dangerous slips through your portal.

business_events.name: Exotic World Discovery
business_events.description: Your portal reveals a land rich with treasures.

business_events.name: Luxury Festival
business_events.description: Your Waifu Resort hosts a grand vacation event.

business_events.name: Unexpected Maintenance
business_events.description: Repairs and cleaning reduce efficiency.

business_events.name: Hidden Island Found
business_events.description: Your Skyship crew discovers a new floating island of riches.

business_events.name: Sky Pirate Raid
business_events.description: Sky pirates raid your ships, stealing profits.

auction_events.name: Collector's Special
auction_events.description: Rare items appear more frequently in auctions

auction_events.name: Noble's Estate Sale
auction_events.description: High-value items from a wealthy collector

sniper.description: Automatic bidding in the last few minutes

common.name: Gather Herbs
common.description: Collect medicinal herbs from the forest
story_outcomes: {waifu} carefully gathered rare herbs, earning {reward} gold.
{waifu} found a hidden grove full of valuable plants!

common.name: Hunt a Monster
common.description: Defeat a wandering beast threatening nearby villages
story_outcomes: {waifu} defeated the monster after an intense battle, gaining {reward} XP!
{waifu} used clever tactics to outwit the beast.

common.name: Deliver Message
common.description: Carry an important message between distant cities
story_outcomes: {waifu} successfully delivered the message, earning {reward} gold.
{waifu} made the journey safely despite rough weather.

common.name: Mine Crystals
common.description: Extract valuable crystals from ancient caves
story_outcomes: {waifu} discovered shimmering crystals deep in the cave.
{waifu} carefully extracted precious gems from the mine.

common.name: Patrol the Village
common.description: Help keep the peace in a nearby settlement
story_outcomes: {waifu} deterred troublemakers, earning {reward} XP.
{waifu} reassured the villagers and strengthened bonds.

common.name: Fishing Trip
common.description: Spend time by the river catching fish
story_outcomes: {waifu} caught a rare {reward_item}!
{waifu} enjoyed the calm waters and brought back fresh fish.

common.name: Escort Caravan
common.description: Protect a merchant caravan along a dangerous road
story_outcomes: {waifu} fought off bandits and earned {reward} gold.
{waifu} kept the merchants safe until their destination.

common.name: Train in Dojo
common.description: Sharpen your skills under a master
story_outcomes: {waifu} pushed their limits and gained {reward} XP.
{waifu} learned new fighting techniques from the master.

rare.name: Rescue the Lost Relic
rare.description: Recover a legendary artifact from dangerous ruins
story_outcomes: {waifu} braved ancient traps to recover the legendary {reward}!
{waifu} solved mystical puzzles to claim the {reward}.

rare.name: Dragon's Challenge
rare.description: Face an ancient dragon in single combat
story_outcomes: {waifu} emerged victorious from the dragon's lair with incredible rewards!
{waifu} proved their worth against the ancient wyrm.

rare.name: Mystical Portal
rare.description: Investigate a mysterious portal to another realm
story_outcomes: {waifu} returned from another dimension with strange treasures.
{waifu} witnessed wonders beyond imagination in the mystical realm.

rare.name: Bandit Stronghold
rare.description: Raid a dangerous hideout of bandits
story_outcomes: {waifu} defeated the bandit leader and seized {reward} gold.
{waifu} burned the stronghold to the ground and returned victorious.

rare.name: Haunted Catacombs
rare.description: Explore the cursed catacombs beneath the city
story_outcomes: {waifu} braved terrifying spirits to recover the {reward_item}.
{waifu} found ancient treasures amidst the haunting whispers.

legendary.name: Godslayer's Trial
legendary.description: Undertake the ultimate test of strength and wisdom
story_outcomes: {waifu} completed the impossible trial, earning divine recognition!
{waifu} transcended mortal limits to claim the {reward}.

legendary.name: The Eternal Labyrinth
legendary.description: Navigate an endless maze crafted by the gods themselves
story_outcomes: {waifu} conquered the Eternal Labyrinth, finding the {reward}.
{waifu} wandered for days but emerged with divine spoils.

legendary.name: Celestial Convergence
legendary.description: Harness the power of the stars during a rare alignment
story_outcomes: {waifu} captured the essence of the stars, wielding cosmic power!
{waifu} absorbed celestial energy and gained legendary might.

guild_activities.description: Team up to defeat powerful bosses

guild_activities.description: Compete against other guilds in organized battles

stages.description: Collect materials for the guild project

dark.description: Masters of forbidden arts and power

spring.description: Waifus enjoy the blooming season with special bonuses

autumn.description: Autumn brings wisdom and rare treasures

winter.description: Cozy winter activities with relationship bonuses

festival_of_stars.description: Celestial lights grant mystical powers to waifus

eternal_dusk.name: Eternal Dusk
eternal_dusk.description: A twilight season where shadows dance eternally

story_events.description: A mysterious temple has appeared, offering legendary rewards to brave explorers

chapters.title: Temple Discovery
chapters.story: Your waifus discover an ancient temple hidden in the mists

chapters.title: Inner Chambers
chapters.story: Deep within the temple, your waifus face ancient guardians

story_events.name: Dragon's Challenge
story_events.description: An ancient dragon challenges the strongest waifus to prove their worth

chapters.title: Dragon's Lair
chapters.story: Your team approaches the dragon's mountain lair

story_events.name: The Shattered Sky
story_events.description: Fragments of the sky fall to the earth, and waifus must restore balance

chapters.title: Falling Stars
chapters.story: Meteor fragments crash across the land

story_events.name: Curse of the Blood Moon
story_events.description: A crimson moon rises, cursing the land with dark powers

chapters.title: The Crimson Night
chapters.story: The moon glows red, monsters emerge stronger than ever

story_events.name: The Eternal Library
story_events.description: A hidden library reveals forbidden knowledge to those brave enough

chapters.title: Hall of Tomes
chapters.story: Ancient books float in midair, whispering secrets

story_events.name: Rise of the Phoenix
story_events.description: A legendary phoenix emerges, testing the courage of heroes

chapters.title: Fiery Rebirth
chapters.story: Flames engulf the skies as the phoenix descends

limited_events.name: Valentine's Heart Hunt
limited_events.description: Find special heart tokens hidden throughout the world

limited_events.name: Halloween Spook Fest
limited_events.description: Spooky challenges with rare costume rewards

limited_events.name: New Year's Fireworks
limited_events.description: Celebrate the new year with dazzling fireworks and blessings

limited_events.name: White Day Gifts
limited_events.description: Return the love by collecting special sweets

limited_events.name: Golden Festival
limited_events.description: Collect golden coins for rare treasures

limited_events.name: Festival of Flames
limited_events.description: Burning passion rewards those daring enough

limited_events.name: Mystic Lanterns
limited_events.description: Light the path with mystical lanterns

limited_events.name: Starfall Night
limited_events.description: Catch falling stars for cosmic rewards

lore_books.title: Origins of Lucid Dreams
lore_books.description: The creation myth of the dream realm
lore_books.content: In the beginning, there was only void and consciousness. The first dreamers shaped reality with their thoughts, creating realms where waifus could exist beyond mortal comprehension...

lore_books.title: Mythology Compendium
lore_books.content: From the Norse halls of Valhalla to the Egyptian afterlife, these beings have shaped reality itself. Odin's wisdom, Ra's power, Chaos's unpredictability...

lore_books.title: Battle Legends
lore_books.content: The greatest battles are not won through strength alone, but through bonds forged with companions who trust you with their very existence...

achievements.name: Master of Dreams
achievements.description: Complete all lore books and achieve legendary status

Angel Blade.name: Angel Blade
Angel Blade.introduction: It's jungle out there. I will no longer be kind in a world of evil. Against enemies who cannot be influenced by heart, it is a good choice to use violence against violence. Let's go, Angel Blade!

awakening_skills.description: Deals an extra 100% DMG to all enemies
Make 1 more teammate enter [Excite] state, which deals 40% Crit DMG additionally
ATK+10%, CRIT+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, Conqueror of Legends, and friends battle)

Angel Heart.name: Angel Heart

30.name: Thunderstroke
30.description: Deals an extra 100% DMG to 2 enemies

90.name: Twilight
90.description: ATK+10%, CRIT+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, and friends battle)

Angel Heart.description: In a despicable person's eyes, Angel Heart is a dangerous thing; For a kind-hearted person, Angel Heart can be a sharp sword in his hand and slay the despicable souls.

Arrow of Love.name: Arrow of Love

30.name: Heart to Heart
30.description: Grants all angels an additional shield by 100% of Cupid's Max ATK.

60.name: Cupid Arrows
60.description: Increase the coefficient of P.DMG by 50%, and Crit is guaranteed if enemies in any debuff situation.

90.name: Twilight
90.description: Speed+100, Crit DMG+20% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, and friends battle)

Arrow of Love.introduction: On this romantic night, send the blessings of love to your dear. Cupid is using arrows to weave a loving line that belongs only to this couple.

Blessing Elixir.name: Blessing Elixir
Blessing Elixir.introduction: The baby in the swaddle was abandoned and life shouldn't have been so damaged. The magpie was flying to guard and the golden tortoise swam into the sea with the baby on its back. Buddha rescued her and handed it to Huazi for adoption. When this baby growed up. She will bring more healing to the creatures.

Blood Pool.name: Blood Pool
Blood Pool.introduction:
When he came back to his senses, the hand was tingled.
The scar is healed by time, but the heart was sad by rose.
The heart has been stolen, willing to turn into a drop in this pool of blood.

Book of Destiny.name: Book of Destiny
Book of Destiny.introduction:
No one knows their fate on Book of Destiny.
You will know nothing about your life until you open the fate box.

Cretan's Maze.name: Cretan's Maze
Cretan's Maze.introduction: Daedalus built an unusually complex and chaotic maze. But no matter how complicated it is, it cannot be a cover for Milos.

Dead Blond Hair.name: Dead Blond Hair
Dead Blond Hair.description: It is dazzling, like golden wheat in the ground. Even if the gold thread is now woven into such an eternal laurel, there is no chance to return to that summer.

Destiny Wheel.name: Destiny Wheel
Destiny Wheel.introduction: The destiny wheel can never stop spinning. Destiny is more fascinating because of its ups and downs. Because of the uncertainty, it is worth the challenge. It finally realize that the process of chasing destiny is far more interesting than the result.

skills.name: Holy Wing (Newborn Feather)
skills.description: If the target's HP is higher than 80%, increase the CRIT by 50%

skills.name: Chain of light (Heart-locking Chain)
skills.description: If the target's HP is lower than 30%, increase the CRIT by 50%

skills.name: Twilight
skills.description: ATK+10%, Crit DMG+20% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, Conqueror of Legends, and friends battle)

Divine Dice of Destiny.name: Divine Dice of Destiny
Divine Dice of Destiny.introduction: The forbidden artifact of the Asa Divine Realm, which is said to be powerful enough to change the fate of deities. Whether it is survival, or destruction, everything is hidden in this divine dice.

awakening_skills.name: Phantom Spell (The Art of Invisibility)
awakening_skills.description: Increase the coefficient of P.DMG by 50%, additionally increase hit probability of [Blind] by 30%

awakening_skills.name: Live or Die (Judgment of Fate)
awakening_skills.description: Increase the probability of rolling big numbers of the dice

awakening_skills.name: Twilight
awakening_skills.description: ATK+10%, Speed+100 (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, Conqueror of Legends, and friends battle)

Doll of Love.name: Doll of Love
Doll of Love.description: Although it is difficult for Izanami to have a relationship with the Amaterasu, she had an incomparable desire of it. This feeling is watered on the Amaterasu's doll, floating among the plants and trees of the world.

Eight Trigrams.name: Eight Trigrams
Eight Trigrams.introduction: Anciently, when Bao-xi had come to the rule of all under heaven, looking up, he contemplated the brilliant forms exhibited in the sky, and looking down he surveyed the patterns shown on the earth. On this he devised the eight trigrams, to show fully the attributes of the spirit-like and intelligent (operations working secretly), and to classify the qualities of the myriads of things.

Elato's Harp.name: Elato's Harp
Elato's Harp.introduction: This is a story about art and joy, and the harp silently recounts this memory in its own way.

Ember Spirit.name: Ember Spirit

30.name: Ember Dragon Breath
30.description: Inflict [Ignite] on all enemies, and UR Ember Dragon will grant all teammates an extra [Fire Shield]

90.name: Twilight
90.description: ATK+10%, CRIT+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, and friends battle)

Ember Spirit.introduction: It is said that the Ember Dragon is a girl who loves cleanliness. It is true, she always easier to deal with the dust left by the enemy. It's just that she is going to trouble the Storm Dragon again to clean the dust.

Fate Umbrella.name: Fate Umbrella
Fate Umbrella.introduction: It's raining heavily, and you are worried about whether or not an umbrella will be enough to keep her from getting wet. Enmusubi disagrees, a fate umbrella is enough. This is the rain of love. Rain is hugging her to bring each other closer.

awakening_skills.name: Affection (Thrilling tenderness)
awakening_skills.description: All teammates will be granted an extra shield by 10% of Enmusubi's Max ATK for 1 round if the last position angel in your team takes any buff effect from Enmusubi.

awakening_skills.name: Dizzy (Love whirlpool)
awakening_skills.description: Increase the coefficient of M.DMG by 15%

awakening_skills.name: Twilight
awakening_skills.description: ATK+10%, HP+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, and friends battle)

Five-color Stone.name: Five-color Stone

awakening_skills.name: Strike of Nuwa
awakening_skills.description: Increase the coefficient of M.DMG by 30%

awakening_skills.name: Sky Mending Colors
awakening_skills.description: Increase the coefficient of Restore HP by 40%

awakening_skills.name: Twilight
awakening_skills.description: ATK+10%, HP+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, and friends battle)

Five-color Stone.introduction: The four pillars fell and the land of earth was destroyed. Fire spread everywhere and floods crushed houses. Humans have lost the hope for their lives. Nuwa who mended the sky with the five-color stone. Just like her mother, she used all kinds of five-color stones to prop up the sky of our growth.

Flag of Resistance.name: Flag of Resistance
Flag of Resistance.introduction: Jeanne d'Arc met an angel under the big tree behind the village and received 'God's revelation'. She raised the rebellious war flag and led her generals to win the war. This flag followed her in the battle on the front lines of the war but was never broken. The oracles from flag often helped Jeanne d'Arc.

Frosty Spear.name: Frosty Spear

awakening_skills.name: Frost Dragon Breath (Frozen Blizzard)
awakening_skills.description: Increase the coefficient of M.DMG by 20%, and the chance of [freeze] enemies increases by 15%

awakening_skills.name: Cold Guardian (Aegis of Ice)
awakening_skills.description: Apply [Ice Armor] to all teammates for 3 rounds

awakening_skills.name: Twilight
awakening_skills.description: HP+10%, Speed+100 (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, and friends battle)

Frosty Spear.introduction: Away from the boredom of the sky, away from the noise on the ground. The Frost dragon is lying quietly in the deeping ice cave. This silence makes the mind deeper and gives the ice spear the power of fantasy.

Gentle Pray.name: Gentle Pray
Gentle Pray.description: Raphael owns the title of Wisdom Angel. This is representative of powerful strength. In the night of winter, it is the existence that can warm and heal people's hearts.

Ghost Blade.name: Ghost Blade

awakening_skills.name: Soul Heaven Slash
awakening_skills.description: DMG dealt will not trigger DMG reflection.

awakening_skills.name: Mysterious Slash
awakening_skills.description: The chance to trigger mysterious power increases by 30%.

awakening_skills.name: Twilight
awakening_skills.description: ATK+10%, CRIT+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, and friends battle).

Ghost Blade.introduction: Under the blue sky, there was a young girl practicing swordsmanship, sometimes absent-minded, and sometimes arrogant. Waving a few slashes towards the sky, split the confusion in happiness, but the girl's confusion is more than these.

Gold Censer.name: Gold Censer
Gold Censer.introduction: The censer is full of magical power. It can ward off evil spirits, attract blessings, and gives peculiar power to the Ungnyeo.

Guiding Lantern.name: Guiding Lantern

awakening_skills.name: Shuraba (Shura King Realm)
awakening_skills.description: All enemies will receive an extra 3% of Asura's attributes reduction

awakening_skills.name: Hatred Heart (Antipathy heart)
awakening_skills.description: Increase the coefficient of P.DMG by 50%

awakening_skills.name: Twilight
awakening_skills.description: CRIT+10%, FOR+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, and friends battle)

Guiding Lantern.introduction: On this lonely road, there is always a need for guidance, no matter whether it is the light in her heart. Asura didn't seem to treat the enemies' souls so cruelly, and it was a bit of comfort for the bruised fleshes in Shuraba.

Horn of Doom.name: Horn of Doom
Horn of Doom.introduction: The doomsday represents the end of the old era. What new era will usher in? The horn of doomsday does not give its answer.

Judgment Blade.name: Judgment Blade

awakening_skills.name: The will of celestial
awakening_skills.description: Increase the coefficient of M.DMG by 50%

awakening_skills.name: Sanction of Light
awakening_skills.description: Increase the coefficient of M.DMG by 80%

awakening_skills.name: Twilight
awakening_skills.description: ATK+10%, Crit DMG +20% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, and friends battle)

Judgment Blade.introduction: No one can escape her judgment, even if you are the king of hell. After forty-nine years, even the time is longer than this, Michael will not give up the trial of darkness.

Laurel Wreath.name: Laurel Wreath
Laurel Wreath.introduction: Embarked on a journey to find the only one in my heart. The road is torturous and complicated in journey, but as long as your firm direction, the angel of victory will eventually wear a laurel crown on your head.

magic mirror.name: Magic Mirror
magic mirror.description: Phantasos knew every skill and she can transform into the appearance of everything in the world. No one has ever seen the original appearance of Phantasos, maybe she has forgotten what she was originally.

Merciless.name: Merciless
Merciless.introduction: Sins turn into silk threads and gradually wrap around you. You cannot breathe. Your body and soul will die unless the silks are cut through by Nemesis. Even in her merciless justice, death is inevitable as she cuts through the silks, down into your very soul.

Miniature Universe.name: Miniature Universe
Miniature Universe.introduction: Standing on the solid ground and surrounded by the hustle and bustle of the city, everyone is busy living their own life and worries about trivial things. But the vastness of the universe humbles us. We all live under the eye of Gaia and we exist in this chaotic universe only because of Gaia's love for us.

awakening_skills.description: Increase the coefficient of M.DMG by 30%
Increase the coefficient of M.DMG by 120%
ATK+10%, Crit +10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, Conqueror of Legends, and friends battle)

Moonlight Law.name: Moonlight Law
Moonlight Law.introduction: Light can scribble through the night sky, and light can shine straight into people's hearts. But light will be absorbed by black hole and it also follows Nyx's Moon Night Law.

Myth Peach.name: Myth Peach
Myth Peach.introduction: The flowers and the fruits are small. Myth Peach were riped for three thousand years, when people ate them, they will become immortals and their body will be light; Myth Peach were riped for six thousand years, when people ate them will be soaring and living

Nether Shawl.name: Nether Shawl
Nether Shawl.introduction: The nether god Erebus is the embodiment of eternal darkness, and she uses her Nether Shawl to block the world and the underworld. No trace of light can pass through the Nether Shawl to reach the territory of Erebus, she is staying in darkness forever.

awakening_skills.name: Evernight
awakening_skills.description: Increase the coefficient of P.DMG to 3% when losing 1% self HP

awakening_skills.name: Grudges of Hades
awakening_skills.description: Increase the coefficient of P.DMG by 70%

awakening_skills.name: Twilight
awakening_skills.description: ATK+10%, HP+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, and friends battle)

Pandora's Box.name: Pandora's Box
Pandora's Box.source: Abyss store OR using Orange Relic Fragment with probability to synthesis it. Not included in relic summoning pool.
Pandora's Box.introduction: Even though humans know what dangers lie ahead, they still can't retain their desires, hence a lot of suffering in the wake of opening Pandora's Boxes. Humans are still opening Pandora's Boxes one after another. But never forget the last hope hidden in Pandora's Boxes.

Petrified Magic Eye.name: Petrified Magic Eye
Petrified Magic Eye.introduction: Through the beautiful eyes, I saw you and Medusa are in the journey. It is beautiful and pure. It likes and unattainable dream, but it makes you willing to pursue it until your body and soul slowly petrify.

Pink Butterfly.name: Pink Butterfly

30.description: Heals 4 angels with the lowest HP

60.description: Deals extra 250% DMG to the enemy with the lowest current HP, and inflicts [Bleed] effect

90.description: ATK+10%, HP+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, Conqueror of Legends, and friends battle)

Pink Butterfly.introduction: The bell on the bow are making a jingle sound gracefully, and gradually it's getting closer and closer. Deliberately trying to avoid this gentle trap. Your eyes start to drift away. But these are all illusions.

Plane Lens.name: Plane Lens
Plane Lens.introduction: Seeing countless different futures, joy, anger, sorrow, and joy alternate in various parallel worlds. Gemini is always observing silently, constantly searching for the mystery of the universe and the ultimate answer hidden among us.

awakening_skills.description: Attacks the shield enemy again, but the DMG dealt will not ignore the target's shield and M.RES.
Additional DMG will be triggered if the enemy is killed.
ATK+10%, CRIT+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, Conqueror of Legends, and friends battle).

Poseidon's Trident.name: Poseidon's Trident
Poseidon's Trident.description: Ordinary weapons: tearing the land, crushing rocks, and collapsing the earth. Poseidon's Trident: It can do what ordinary weapons can do. Also it can tear the universe and expose the underworld.

Pride Wings.name: Pride Wings
Pride Wings.introduction: We can't detect her guilt through her beautiful face from a fallen angel. Until she spread her Pride Wings.

Pyramid.name: Pyramid
Pyramid.introduction: Memories are blurred by suffering and joy is taken away from death. For the souls who came to the underworld, it is still the other side of the heart.

Scale of Truth.name: Scale of Truth

30.name: Eye of Ra (Star Gaze)
30.description: Release the skill again if the targeted enemy has been killed.

60.name: Solar Storm (Universe Storm)
60.description: Increase the coefficient of M.DMG by 20% and burn enemies' Max HP.

90.name: Twilight
90.description: ATK+10%, CRIT+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, and friends battle)

Scale of Truth.description: Anubis's scale of truth fell into Ra's hands and the dead people will have a wonderful journey of their soul weighing.

Shennongqin.name: Shennongqin
Shennongqin.description: Shennongqin has five strings on it: Yue, Gong, Jiao, Zheng ,Yu. The sound of it can express the virtue of heaven and earth and bring happiness to people.

Sky Dome.name: Sky Dome
Sky Dome.introduction: The sun, moon and stars all perish and regenerate under her dome. Hundreds of millions of lives on the earth are sheltering the reincarnation of the next generation.

Song of Siren.name: Song of Siren
Song of Siren.description: Don't approach the good night in the night and fall asleep in such a comfortable song to avoid falling into their mouths.

Spirit Wrapper.name: Spirit Wrapper
Spirit Wrapper.introduction: The wrapper is sacred and pure. Geb used them to wrap the sinful souls. Buried under the earth, there is no way to escape forever.

Starfire Stone.name: Starfire Stone
Starfire Stone.introduction: Under the uncanny work of nature, this Starfire Stone has continued the Chinese civilization. Lie down in the jungle and mountains when calm, and burst into starlight sparks when fierce. It is both a continuation of civilization and a dangerous terminator.

Supreme Scepter.name: Supreme Scepter
Supreme Scepter.introduction: Do you want to have supreme rights? Do you want to be respected by Zeus? Hera will destroy you without batting an eye if your answer is yes.

awakening_skills.description: Song of war (Hero Hymn): 10% of Hera's Crit DMG and FOR will be added in [Encourage]
For the Throne (Supreme Glory): Increase the coefficient of Hera's M.DMG by 30%, and the DMG must be doubled.
Twilight: ATK+10%, DEF+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, Conqueror of Legends, and friends battle)

Surprise Wreath.name: Surprise Wreath
Surprise Wreath.introduction: The Xmas Angel ask about what the surprise is? The Xmas Angel stared at the wreath in her hand and thought, she seemed to be excited when she discovered a new world of flowers and plants. She is still thinking, looking for an answer forever.

skills.name: Frozen Snow (Frozen field)
skills.description: Increase the coefficient of P.DMG by 40%

skills.name: Arrow of Surprise (Surprise Arrow)
skills.description: Deals P.DMG to one more enemy

skills.name: Twilight
skills.description: ATK+10%, CRIT+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, Conqueror of Legends, and friends battle)

Sword of Sun and Moon.name: Sword of Sun and Moon
Sword of Sun and Moon.introduction: It is too dreamy, too fascinating, representing the ethereal in the starry sky, and the eternity of the universe. Energetic human being, be courage to use Sword of Sun and Moon to explore this dangerous universe.

awaken_skills.name: Shiny Pulse (Divine retribution)
awaken_skills.description: Double the coefficient of M.DMG for the 1st strike

awaken_skills.name: Demon Retreat (Primal force)
awaken_skills.description: For every empty slot in line-up (as 7 enemies deployed), and the Max M.DMG is 1050%.

awaken_skills.name: Twilight
awaken_skills.description: ATK+10%, CRIT+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, Conqueror of Legends, and friends battle)

The Eye of Horus.name: The Eye of Horus
The Eye of Horus.introduction: This supreme artifact from Egyptian mythology represents the divine protection and ultimate sovereignty of the gods. It is said no one can lie while under the gaze of The Eye of Horus.

awakening_skills.name: Judgment Claw (Divine Judgment)
awakening_skills.description: When the bearer of [Judgment] is defeated, the enemy who defeated her becomes the target. Reduces the target's ATK by extra 5%.

awakening_skills.name: Punishment Eye (Divinity Eye)
awakening_skills.description: All allies receive an extra shield equal to 200% of Horus's ATK that lasts for 2 rounds (cannot be dispelled).

awakening_skills.name: Twilight
awakening_skills.description: Speed +100, Buff Hit Probability +10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, Conqueror of Legends, and friends battle)

Throne.name: Throne
Throne.introduction: Iris as the meaning of the throne provided the throne to pharaoh who is Iris's child. Iris can use her throne to protect young children and dead people, also she can also use her throne to resurrect the dead.

valhalla.name: Valhalla
valhalla.introduction: The dying warriors accepted Valkyrie's death kiss and were led to Valhalla. Only the brave death warriors can arrive to Valhalla in their dreams. Death warriors enjoying the most satisfying life of fighting during the day and resurrecting at night.

awakening_skills.name: Light Spear
awakening_skills.description: Increase the coefficient of P.DMG by 20%, and increase the chance of [Steal] by 10%

awakening_skills.name: Heroic Stab
awakening_skills.description: Deals an extra 280% P.DMG to the target if the target's current HP is lower than 30% of her Max HP

awakening_skills.name: Twilight
awakening_skills.description: ATK+10%, HP+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, Conqueror of Legends, and friends battle)

Veil of Death.name: Veil of Death
Veil of Death.introduction: Hades has many veils, one of those veils is really special. Is it because of the veil itself? No, the person who gave me the veil gave it an unique meaning.

awakening_skills.name: Underground Hand
awakening_skills.description: Release the skill again (up to 6 times) if the targeted enemy has been killed.

awakening_skills.name: Underground Fog
awakening_skills.description: Increase the coefficient of P.DMG by 50%.

awakening_skills.name: Twilight
awakening_skills.description: ATK+10%, CRIT+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, Conqueror of Legends, and friends battle).

Yasakani no Magatama.name: Yasakani no Magatama
Yasakani no Magatama.introduction: Yasakani no Magatama can protect people from disasters and allow people to obtain divine blessings. Coordinates the growth of all things, represents the sun and the moon and is bestowed by Izanami.

awakening_skills.name: Vibrating Jade Charm
awakening_skills.description: Increase the coefficient of P.DMG by 15%, enemies under the state of [Stun] reduce DEF by 40% for 1 round

awakening_skills.name: Yata no Kagami
awakening_skills.description: Enemies under the state of [Ignite] will lose 4% of self Max HP for 4 rounds.

awakening_skills.name: Twilight
awakening_skills.description: Speed+100, Buff Hit Probability+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, and friends battle)

Youth Apple.name: Youth Apple
Youth Apple.introduction: When the bird of youth is not there and it was captured by the autumn wind. Only youth apple can bring vigor and hope to people.
